title: Grow to Learn - Drip Irrigation Installation Demo

tasks.task: Installing a drip irrigation system for a school garden
subtasks: Attaching a filter to the system
Connecting a pressure regulator to the filter
Attaching an adapter to connect the pressure regulator and main line
Ensuring the main line is securely attached to the adapter
Installing drip tape with emitters every 12 inches (or desired interval) and connecting it to the main line
Closing the end of the drip tape and main line with appropriate fittings
Adding a splitter piece for multiple main lines if necessary
Using tee pieces or elbow pieces to direct the main line through the garden beds
Researching and selecting the appropriate drip irrigation kit for the garden
